channel.title: Notice board | Unimi
channel.description: General notice board of the University of Milan "La Statale"

item.title: On 1 November, the University is closed
item.description: On 1 November academic and administrative activities of the University of Milan are suspended.%0A

item.title: International Welcome Desk
item.description: As part of our commitment to supporting our international student community, we are pleased to introduce our new dedicated service, the International Welcome Desk that will support international students in presence and through MS Teams.%0AAll available information at the page International Students Office - Welcome Desk.%0A

item.title: Special English Test Session Dedicated to Soon-To-Be Graduates in The Autumn Session
item.description: The SLAM Centre is running a special English test session dedicated to soon-to-be graduates in the autumn session. The test is being held in person at the SLAM Centre, 11, Santa Sofia street ‚Äì Milan - on the following day:%0A‚Ä¢ 09th November 2023 at 9.30 a.m.%0A%0A‚ñ∂Ô∏è Learn more on Unimi.it
